data.name: Heavenly Puzzle
data.detailed_description:
A puzzle game where you have to collect whole pictures from different pieces. Choose a more convenient mode for yourself and play. Not everyone manages to complete all the levels, but there are a lot of them!

Heavenly Puzzle - a puzzle game for manual dexterity and ingenuity. Assemble the whole picture from puzzle pieces. You can choose the difficulty, where time and number of lives are limited. You simply have to collect them all!

Game Features:
- Choice of difficulty level
-Pixel Art
- Simple controls
- Puzzles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, Mouse
